author: hwright
msg: Don't use globbing where it's not necessary.
It's an easy optimisation well worth doing!

author: buscob
msg: Fixed a dropdown menu flickering bug in bluelight and droppingcrumbs themes using the same solution as in tomahawk theme.
This bug consists in the dropdown menus to be temporary visible when the page takes a while to be loaded completely.

author: hwright
msg: Locks without athn SEGV in mod_dav_svn
I think it can only happen during commit to a server that doesn't require
authn, but a server SEGV is bad.
